Name: root
description: the root to your tools and data

Name: indexfileIDtest
description: Append .chr1 if you want to test only on chr 1

Name: allRunDemultiplexDir
description: Demultiplex historical data specific runs directory

Name: projectdir
description: project folder for this insilico run

Name: projectrawdatadir
description: project specific rawdata directory for (demultiplexed) reads

Name: projectrawarraydatadir
description: Contains project specific rawdata (i.e., Genome Studio files)

Name: intermediatedir
description: store intermediate results here; empty at end of project

Name: projectResultsDir
description: Store final results here; a sub set of the primary outputs that we want to keep/archive are moved to this dir; afterwards the remaining files from the intermediate dir will be lost when we clean up.

Name: fileWithIndexID
description: Just a shorthand in this parameters file
